item.description:
Career Fair 2010 Reinventing your career for new opportunities.

Open Career Fair - May 21 2010

Open Career Fair 2010 with dual tracks:
•Strategies for careers (student track)
•Reinventing your career (mid-level to senior Management track)

If anything, the last two years have shown that flexibility is key to adapting to an ever-changing market. Convergence among technologies and sectors is creating new opportunities for growth. For example, as life sciences becomes more dependent on bioinformatics, IT skill sets become invaluable. Understanding how your skills and strengths can be applied to growth sectors is key to adapting to the new economy. Whether you are embarking on a new career and are wondering how to position yourself for the future, or you are amidst a mid-career change, this event is for you! Learn how to think about leveraging your skill sets for new opportunities!

Where/When
Friday, May 21
5:30-8:30 PM

Cooley Godward
500 Boylston St.
Boston, MA

Attire
Business Casual

Cost
$25 Pre-registration
$40 onsite


Register Online today for savings of $15 off the onsite rate.

http://www.open-newen...
item.name: Reinventing your career for new opportunities.
